classique.title: Classic game mode
classique.text: Face opponents in balanced fights. The objective is to put health points of your opponent to 0.

survie.title: Survival game mode
survie.text: Test your endurance ! Face waves of increasingly powerful opponents. How many rounds will you be able to survive ?

classique-weeknd.text: A special game mode who is only available in weekend ! Enjoy unique bonuses and more rewards. The basic rules are the same as the classic game mode.
